derivation: or (masculine) מַכֶּה; (plural only) from H5221 (נָכָה); a blow (in 2 Chronicles 2:10, of the flail); by implication,
outline:
1. blow, wound, slaughter
    1. blow, stripe
    2. beating, scourging
    3. wound
    4. slaughter
    5. defeat, conquest
    6. plague
kjv_def: beaten, blow, plague, slaughter, smote, [idiom] sore, stripe, stroke, wound(-ed).
strongs_def: a wound; figuratively, carnage, also pestilence
